not_recognized: I'm sorry, I didn't quite catch that. Could you please repeat?
Apologies, I didn't understand what you said. Can you please rephrase?
I'm sorry, I couldn't comprehend your message. Can you please clarify?
Oops! It seems like I didn't get that. Could you please say it again?
I'm sorry, but I'm having trouble understanding your request. Can you please try again?
confirmation: Understood! I'll get right on it.
Got it! I'll start working on that.
Noted! I'll take care of it for you.
Message received! I'll handle the task.
Confirmed! I'll proceed with the request.
afk: It seems like there has been no activity for a while. Please shut me off if I'm not needed.
I've been idle for some time. If I'm not necessary, please turn me off.

no_spices: I sadly couldn't recognize any spices that I have in your sentence. Would you like to try one from your current stock?
